summary: Allows continuation along the smithing perk tree beyond dragon to daedric or glass right back to steel.
descriptionHtml:
Circular Smithing by ZHOOL

Allows continuation of the smith tree beyond dragon. I'm sure most people using this are light armorers who just want to improve their daedric weapons (i know i am), but i did the whole thing anyway so you can go fully clockwise or anti-clockwise if you like.

installation: copy .esp into your skyrim\data folder and activate using the data files button on the skyrim splash screen. ensure mod is loaded after other mods that alter smithing perk tree. removing the mod won't take away any perks you've gained using it, or cause any other issues.

compatible with Smithing Perks Overhaul (Improved Vanilla Version) - thx JettoDz
author: ZHOOL
